caption.title: Representative listing of aggregate and aggregate associated proteins in oocyt nuclei.
Retained proteins following depletion of soluble nuclear components.
Key with brief descriptions of the data sets.

tr.td: Minichromosome Maintenance Complex Component 2, involved in replication initiation
DNA Polymerase Epsilon, Contributes to DNA repair and replication
Werner Syndrome RecQ Like Helicase, DEAH 5' to 3' DNA with 3' to 5' exonuclease activity
Primase Subunit 2, DNA directed RNA polymerase that generates lagging
General Transcription Factor IIH Subunit 2, member of RNA pol II transcription initiation factor IIH complex
Serine and Arginine Repetitive Matrix 1, Part of pre- and post-splicing multiprotein mRNP complexes
XPA Binding Protein 2, participates in mRNA splicing and nucleotide excision repair
Nucleolar and Coiled-Body Phosphoprotein, heavily modified regulator of RNA pol I
Serine Arginine Rich Splicing Factor 5, spliceosome component with an RRM and RS domains
RNA Pol I subunit C, component of RNA Pol I and III complexes
Heat Shock Protein Family A Member 8, constitutively expressed member of HSP70 family
Nucleolin, binds histone H1 to decondense DNA
RNA pol I subunit A, catalytic and largest subunit or RNA Pol I complex
RNA Pol II subunit E, subunit shared between RNA Pol I, II, and III
pescadillo, member of PeBoW complex and contributes to ribosome biogenesis, binds BRCA1
Block of Proliferation 1, participates in rRNA processing and is a member of PeBoW complex
DEAD-Box Helicase 21, facilitates processing or RNA Pol I and II transcripts
